product_name: Continental Mountain King 29er Tire - 29 x 2.2 / 29 x 2.4
long_description: Great for all-around riding, the Continental Mountain King 29er mountain bike tire offers confident traction for your big-wheeled rig. Open tread sheds mud easily while the aggressive knobs and shoulders ensure a firm connection with the trail. Continental Mountain King 29er mountain bike tire features 84 tpi casing with a steel wire bead.
short_description: Great for all-around riding, the Continental Mountain King 29er mountain bike tire offers confident traction for your big-wheeled rig.
